name: Voronoi Color Gem World 360°
description:
Experimenting with native After Effects voronoi cell patterns as displacement maps on a spherical TrapcodeMIR setup. That voronoi pattern is then precomped and colored with the colorama effect. The camera POV is placed in the middle of the sphere. VFX optical glow was used for the glowing effect. Created [21-07-20]. 
1:1 | 800x800 | 180frames | 24FPS

4K high definition video available at VJLoops.com
